title: Creative Writing and Story Elements

vocab.definition: A person or animal in a story
Where and when a story takes place
What happens in a story from beginning to end
The start of a story that introduces characters and setting
The last part of a story that tells how things turn out

teachingNotes: Guide students through writing simple stories with clear beginning, middle, and end. Focus on creating interesting characters and settings. Encourage use of descriptive words and proper story structure.
